scenes.description: ReGLOSS performs their song 'Symmetry' (シンメトリー) on a 3D stage.
The members of ReGLOSS catch their breath, celebrate their performance, and begin their self-introductions.

subtitles.original: 鳴り止まぬ鼓動 かき消すように 弦をはじいて
subtitles.english:
Strumming the strings as if to drown out
the unceasing heartbeat

subtitles.original: 一心不乱に叫ぶ午後 割れた爪を眺めてる暇もないよ
subtitles.english:
An afternoon of shouting in earnest,
no time to look at broken nails

subtitles.original: 時の流れに飲み込まれたっていい
subtitles.english: It's okay to be swallowed by the flow of time

subtitles.original: 立ちはだかる壁に 向こう側を覗かそう
subtitles.english:
Let's peek at the other side
of the walls that stand in our way

subtitles.original:
ぱっと見惑わす 君が気付けばマスターピース
登りつめていけ いただき 努力だけは裏切らない
subtitles.english:
If you notice the confusion at first glance, it's a masterpiece.
Climb to the top; only effort won't betray you.

subtitles.original:
巻いてる点と線 目いっぱい 線と線
晴れてるヘッドセット ずっとずっと点光線
subtitles.english:
Dots and lines scattered, lines and lines to the full.
Headset set up, always and forever, a beam of light.

subtitles.original: はぐらかした桃源郷 静かに灯す 青い炎
subtitles.english: A red-herring paradise, quietly lighting a blue flame.

subtitles.original: 多少強引でもご挨拶 じっと見つめて
subtitles.english: Even if it's a bit forced, a greeting. Stare intently.

subtitles.original: 駆けていく 旋律のよう 恋い焦がれて 咲き乱れて
subtitles.english: Running like a melody, yearning, blooming in full glory.

subtitles.original: 失いかけた夢の続きを 紡いでいこう
subtitles.english: Let's spin the continuation of the dream we almost lost.

subtitles.original: 乾いた世界を満たしてメロディ Keep your heart, 一心同体
subtitles.english: Fill the parched world, melody. Keep your heart, as one soul.

subtitles.original: 君と重なりシンメトリー 手繰り寄せ 朝日のほうへ
subtitles.english:
Symmetry overlapping with you.
Drawing closer, towards the morning sun.

subtitles.original: ほんの微妙なニュアンスの違い 絶妙なバランスの塩梅で
subtitles.english:
Just a slight difference in nuance,
with an exquisite balance of seasoning.

subtitles.original: 全ての歯車たちは巧妙に噛み合っている
subtitles.english: All the gears are cleverly interlocking.

subtitles.original: 数学より緻密な赤い眼光のパラダイム いつも隣り合わせでドライ
subtitles.english:
A paradigm of red glint more precise than math,
always dry and side-by-side.

subtitles.original:
これの果て誰かのナラティブ 新未来も新時代も信じない
今だけを切り開きよう
subtitles.english:
At the end of this, someone's narrative.
I don't believe in the new future or the new era, let's just carve out the now.

subtitles.original: 迫る終焉の足音 願い事は叶わなくとも
subtitles.english:
The sound of the approaching end,
even if my wishes don't come true.

subtitles.original: 始まりまであと一歩 息を潜めて
subtitles.english: Just one step away from the beginning. Hold your breath.

subtitles.original: 静寂を切り裂いて 宇宙(そら)へ翼羽ばたかせて
subtitles.english: Cut through the silence and let your wings flap towards the sky.

subtitles.original: 待ち望む結末に 瞬きすらできないよ
subtitles.english: I can't even blink at the long-awaited ending.

subtitles.original: どんな葛藤も緊張もカタストロフィ 前を向いて飛び越えろ
subtitles.english:
No matter the conflict, tension, or catastrophe,
look ahead and jump over it.

subtitles.original: 真っ新な余白に秘めた想い もう後戻りはしない
subtitles.english:
The feelings hidden in the brand-new blank space,
there's no going back now.

subtitles.original: 駆けていく 旋律のよう 恋い焦がれて 咲き乱れて
subtitles.english: Running like a melody, yearning, blooming in full glory.

subtitles.original: 失いかけた夢の続きを 紡いでいこう
subtitles.english: Let's spin the continuation of the dream we almost lost.

subtitles.original: 乾いた世界を満たしてメロディ Keep your heart, 一心同体
subtitles.english: Fill the parched world, melody. Keep your heart, as one soul.

subtitles.original: 君と重なりシンメトリー 手繰り寄せ 朝日のほうへ
subtitles.english:
Symmetry overlapping with you.
Drawing closer, towards the morning sun.

subtitles.original: イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Yeah!

subtitles.original: めっちゃ緊張したー！
subtitles.english: I was so nervous!

subtitles.original: 泣きそうなんだけどー
subtitles.english: I'm about to cry...

subtitles.original: やばいやばい
subtitles.english: This is crazy, this is crazy!

subtitles.original: トレンド1位だって！
subtitles.english: We're #1 on trending!

subtitles.original: えー！すごい！嬉しい！
subtitles.english: What! Amazing! So happy!

subtitles.original: 本当にトレンド1位だ！
subtitles.english: It's really #1 on trending!

subtitles.original: 水飲んでおいで。
subtitles.english: Go drink some water.

subtitles.original: リリカも水飲もう。
subtitles.english: Ririka, drink some water too.

subtitles.original: 僕は僕だけになるよー。
subtitles.english: I'll be just me for a moment.

subtitles.original: ということで皆さん、お集まりいただきありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: So everyone, thank you for coming today!

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: よし、みんな集まったからいつものやつ行きますか！
subtitles.english: Alright, everyone's back, shall we do the usual thing?

subtitles.original: リーチ・ザ・トップ！ We are ReGLOSS!
subtitles.english: Reach the top! We are ReGLOSS!

subtitles.original: もう一回、もう一回。
subtitles.english: One more time, one more time.

subtitles.original: リーチ・ザ・トップ！ We are ReGLOSS!
subtitles.english: Reach the top! We are ReGLOSS!

subtitles.original: じゃあ青から自己紹介お願いします。
subtitles.english: Okay, Ao, please introduce yourself first.

subtitles.original:
はい！可愛い女の子かと思った？ジャジャーン、青くんでした！
ホロライブデバイス、リグロスのボーイッシュ担当、火威青です！
subtitles.english:
Yes! Did you think I was a cute girl? Ta-da, it's Ao-kun!
I'm Hiodoshi Ao, in charge of the boyish style for Hololive DEV_IS ReGLOSS!

subtitles.original:
ドレミファソラシド！ホロライブデバイス所属、リグロスの音楽の友、音乃瀬奏です！
緊張してるけど今日楽しんでいくぞー！
subtitles.english:
Do-Re-Mi-Fa-So-La-Si-Do! I'm Otonose Kanade,
the music companion of ReGLOSS from Hololive DEV_IS!
I'm nervous, but let's have fun today!

subtitles.original:
可愛い、ポジティブ、ジーニアス！ホロライブデバイス、リグロスの一条莉々華だよ！
みんなに会えてめっちゃ嬉しい、ありがとね！今日は楽しんでいってください！
subtitles.english:
Cute, positive, genius! I'm Ichijou Ririka from Hololive DEV_IS ReGLOSS!
I'm so happy to see everyone, thank you! Please enjoy today!

subtitles.original: はい！えー、ホロライブデバイスはリグロスの賑やかしネタ枠...
subtitles.english: Yes! Uh, from Hololive DEV_IS ReGLOSS, the lively comedy segment...
